summary: Not all that into Potter myself but i know a lot of people are so i whipped up a playful and funny little scene in the river wood trader. look for a table with a piece of paper on it and a book with a Skyrim dragon symbol on the front. like i said it is small mod and my first and its just made for fun and atmosphere :) enjoy :)
descriptionHtml: Not all that into Potter myself but i know a lot of people are so i whipped up a playful and funny little scene in the river wood trader. look for a table with a piece of paper on it and a book with a Skyrim dragon symbol on the front. like i said it is small mod and my first and its just made for fun and atmosphere :) enjoy :)
author: Chaosphoenixx
